actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Amending the rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit consideration of certain long-term resolutions making continuing appropriations.

summary.text: Amends rule XXI of the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit consideration of bills or resolutions making appropriations under the jurisdiction of more than one subcommittee of the Appropriations Committee for periods after November 30 of a fiscal year, unless three-fifths of the House votes to waive or suspend this provision.

titles.title: Amending the rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit consideration of certain long-term resolutions making continuing appropriations.
